titles.title: Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005
Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to allow the area of a Presidentially declared disaster to include the outer Continental Shelf.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to add the outer Continental Shelf to the definition of "United States" under that Act, thus authorizing inclusion of the outer Continental Shelf in presidentially declared disaster areas.
